title: British Pound Soars on Brexit Deal Hopes
text:
Negotiators from the United Kingdom and the European Union are reportedly close to coming to an agreement on a draft of a deal to manage the U.K.’s exit from the EU. The Brexit deadline is fast approaching—just two weeks remain until Oct. 31.

The British pound soared 1.2% against the U.S. dollar on the news, to about 1.28, while the U.K.’s FTSE 100 stock index of large companies swung from a mild loss on the day to about a 0.1% gain. Many of the index’s constituents make most of their profits abroad, so when converted back...
description: Negotiators from the United Kingdom and the European Union are reportedly close to reaching an agreement on a draft of a deal to manage the U.K.’s exit from the EU. The U.K. pound soared 1.2% against the U.S. dollar on the news.
